website_summaries.verdict: An affordable model in and easy to use design that is convenient, but also comes with some longevity issues if not handled with care.
pros: Produces lather with a smooth, thick consistency
Comes with a large shaving brush
cons: The pump dispenser is handy, but requires a gentle touch as it has been known to break
Subpar customer service by the manufacturer has been noted

customer_reviews.title: Horrible customer service not willing to do anything for the ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is junk it started leaking after two months,,, I had to throw it out and I emailed the company the wanted me to ship it back to them so they could repair at a cost to me !! Horrible customer service not willing to do anything for the customer just like throwing 60 bucks in the garbage,,, don’t buy save your money
customer_reviews.author: Kareme Philippou

customer_reviews.title: Not That great.. def spend the money and get the ...
customer_reviews.text: Not That great .. def spend the money and get the better one.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Have Fire Extinguisher Nearby
customer_reviews.text: Plugged this in for 45 minutes and nothing. No power to the unit. Turned the on/off knob a few times and saw a bright spark from underneath and a large amount of smoke. Didn't spill any water on the device or place anywhere near a wet surface. Very poor and cheap quality. Steer clear of this. Update after the second replacement unit atrived... it didn't work either. This product truly is junk. You're better off buying a candle warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Porkchop0916

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: First time to try it and Have been heating for 20 minutes and is not working. Pump and lather comes out to watery. Not sure if heating element worked, if cream would Come out thicker. Now warranty says ship back along with $15. So cost of shipping plus $15 to replace product that never worked.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Maestas

customer_reviews.title: PUMP dont work at all
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in august an when I opened it up The pump did not work, Instead of it pulling the shaving cream inn, it push it out... An I can't find a replacement for it nowhere... $69 down the drain smh An can't get in contact with Customer service...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product broken
customer_reviews.text: I thought I liked this product till the nosel broke 4 weeks into using at my shop...very disappointed wouldn’t recommend buying this product not worth the money spent on it
customer_reviews.author: Abbs

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this some time in January 2020, it is April and it has stopped heating the lather and the light does not come on? Cheap!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Received product and pump was broke have had nothing but ...
customer_reviews.text: Received product and pump was broke have had nothing but problems with it, leaks and temperature changes on it’s own. Msg seller twice before receiving reply that was not helpful at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with product at all. Pump broke with first use. Hopefully who ever sold this will replace the pump.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Broke on arrival
customer_reviews.text: It came broken. I returned it for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Tmarch

customer_reviews.title: Need to ship back for one thats works.
customer_reviews.text: It does not work. No light when turned on and no heated lather. May need to upgrade to better model.
customer_reviews.author: Rita R.

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy and quick. I had another just like it for about a year or so before it broke. Good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far...
customer_reviews.text: This product has worked great for me. Exceeded my expectations. I've only been using it for about a month. But no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rick M.

customer_reviews.title: Warmer burns out fast
customer_reviews.text: The warmer went out a month after I purchased it and I never left it on over night.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Does not make foam. The knob broke as soon ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not make foam. The knob broke as soon as I got it. I was hoping to get results for our barbershop.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: save your money
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for about three months and it broke down on me. The pump stopped working and the whole time I had it, it would take an hour to heat up. It's really big and in the way and the extension cord is very short. I was optimistic about the product when I first bought it, but now since I bought a real hot lather machine I would say do not buy this product. Save your money and spend a little more on the Campell Campbell's hot lather machine. It is hot instantly, thicker cream, and a longer extension cord. More classy looking too.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Not workimg
customer_reviews.text: Never worked sent as a gift overseas now it’s junk
customer_reviews.author: lawrence kolek

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Garbage
customer_reviews.text: BIG WASTE OF MONEY...takes a very long time to heat up at least 25 minutes with highest thermostat setting...plus you have to play with the pump to get it to the right position to pump and when it does pump lather is cold and thin. Warning, if you buy you will be greatly disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Eason

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for a buddy who is a barber Had ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a buddy who is a barber Had this for a few months already broke need to return..
customer_reviews.author: Steven A Thompson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: will not heat lather up for shave I won,t my money back
customer_reviews.author: Billy roy Evans

customer_reviews.title: No better than a cup and brush
customer_reviews.text: I didn't read carefully enough. I thought it had an electric pump and put out a really thick lather. But the lather is pretty much the same as I get when I use a solid cake and a brush. It's fine, but really uses a lot more energy than a cup and brush, for the same results. I'm giving it to DAV
customer_reviews.author: the geek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it till the pump broke and there are no replacement parts to be found save you money
customer_reviews.author: california  dreaming

customer_reviews.title: Poor workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Product did not work for more than a few months. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AMC

customer_reviews.title: It LOOKS impressive but feels like cheap, lightweight components
customer_reviews.text: NOT a fan!! Bought this for my DH, as a Christmas gift. It LOOKS impressive but feels like cheap, lightweight components. My biggest complaint is that it takes well over an HOUR to get warm enough to make not so hot lather. If you have a lot of idle time and like to bake with an easy bake oven, this "hot" lather machine is for you! If you're like me, a normal person with other responsibilities, this is a product worth bypassing!
customer_reviews.author: cdb31569

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome warmer!! I'm a barber and it's been a great addition to my services. Heats up in 20 to 30 min temperature is regulated foam in of a great consistency. It was bigger than expected but Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: TONI YVETTE

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: This machine takes about an hour to fully heat up.I bought this one and the wahl machine and they both take about the same time to heat up.The walh seems to better made and the electrical cord is longer.This machine claims to work with with any liquid shaving cream and that a 8 oz bottle comes with it. I didn't receive anything but I tried using two different brands and they both produced thin watery lather.It works good using walh pre mixed lather.Commom wealth makes their own lather which can be bought at their web site but I haven't tried it
customer_reviews.author: BASSIN 75

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: A nice simple compact attractive unit that works very well and is exactly what needed.
customer_reviews.author: jean claude poulin

customer_reviews.title: It takes a while to get hot but overall it is very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend and he likes it. It takes a while to get hot but overall it is very easy to use. If you have the time to wait until its heat up then it is worth to own one. Once it is heated, the lather is very rich and thick. So far, my boyfriend is using it every morning and he hasn't had any problem with it and the only thing he wishes he can change is the cord needs to be longer. In addition, it came with a high quality brush. I received this product as a discount in a exchange for a honest review.
customer_reviews.author: Hayle Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: VERY PLEASED
customer_reviews.text: Oh I'm about buy another machine just like my last one ,I'm a barber and I had mine and used it about everyday and it finally stopped heating .... I am buying another one as we speak , thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!! I bought 2 for my shop and BOTH stopped heating within 2 months after purchase. Customer service is horrible!!!
customer_reviews.author: bev

customer_reviews.title: A nice close shave! Hot lather feels like a spa treatment!
customer_reviews.text: This professional hot lather machine works excellent! So easy to set up and get started! My husband loves the close shave he gets from it. (the hot lather definitely makes the difference!) I decided to try it myself while he was working. 💁🏻Because, why not?!! Hey, it's summer and a girl needs to shave her legs! The hot lather felt so nice, for a second I felt like I was at the spa getting pampered! 😊 I highly recommend this lather machine to anyone looking for a good quality shave at home. It would make a great gift too! We were given this professional hot lather machine for free in exchange for an honest review.
customer_reviews.author: J. White

customer_reviews.title: Non functional heating element.
customer_reviews.text: Product does not heat. The indicator light is missing, and the on off dial just spins
customer_reviews.author: Red Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Works Great... Can't Beat the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Takes a bit of time to warm up but this lather machine works great. Nothing beats shaving with hot lather in the morning. Super easy to maintain and you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: DMH

customer_reviews.title: Takes too long to warm up ....
customer_reviews.text: Great machine if you have an hour EVERY morning to allow it to warm up
customer_reviews.author: Michael

product_meta.title: Common Wealth Professional Deluxe Hot Lather Machine Barber Latherizer King Size Black Color with Bonus 100% Badger Shaving Brush & 8oz Lather Concentrate
product_meta.description: Shaving is so easy, with push-button instant flow of thick, hot aerated, super wet lather! Hot lather not only gives you one of the smoothest, most comfortable shaves you've ever had, but one of the best. Instant smooth hot creamy aerated lather softens the toughest beards, raises beard hair and opens pours. Experience less irritation, tugging and pulling for an ultra-close luxury barber shave. For barbers and those who would like to experience the luxury of a barber shave at home! Please allow 30 minutes for the solution to heat up upon filling.
feature_bullets: Dispenses smooth hot barber quality shaving cream
Large 680ml no mess bottle - Easy to fill, easy to maintain
Fast heat up time with thermostat control for your ideal heat setting (please allow 30min upon filling the unit)
BONUS: 100% badger shaving brush & 8oz Lather Concentrate
